title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 26 Calle Felipe II
description: Hospital and health center parking. height limitation as there are parasols.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 1 Calle Blas Infante
description: Wide parking spaces on both sides of Blas Infante Street, long and flat. Very quiet street at night (we stayed for two nights), a little traffic in the morning. No discomfort for the neighborhood because two walls run along the street. Waste bins sorting nearby. 10 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 14 Avenida de Carlos Cano
description: Roadside in front of fields

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 51 Calle Encina
description: Easily accessible launderette with ample parking space nearby. Open until 22:00.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 172 Calle Pintor Julio Romero
description: Quiet place next to the sports hall. There is an area in the town, but it was occupied by a fair. Next door is a bar with a good breakfast.

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - 93 Carretera Diseminado Circunvalación
description: Newly built area (February-2021)

title: (14400) Pozoblanco - Unnamed Road
description: Super wooded pitches under the oaks, with a large playground for children and a golf course and its terrace. Very quiet, easy access for small and large motorhomes. One hour from Cordoba.

name: CAMPING LEISURE CITY
title: (14400) CAMPING LEISURE CITY
description: Municipal campsite 2a "Ciudad d'El Ocio". 2 km from Pozoblanco. Bucolic setting in a large complex with golf, horse club, fishing club and hiking trail. Ideal for visiting the Los Pedroches Valley.

title: (14460) Dos Torres - 1D Calle San Blas
description: Online parking, asphalt, very quiet, inhabited area, very close (opposite Plaza Toros) Bar-Churreria "Brillante" exquisite churros and chocolate, 5 minutes from Plaza Ayto., Excellent price-quality food at Bar J. Michelin. Things to see: Tourist Office located in a Casona, free visit, essential visit. Plaza de la Villa, Supports former prison of Torremolinos, Town Hall, Churches, Hermitages, Snow Pit, San Juan Bridge, Santa Ana Bridge with a two-spout fountain and trough, Shields and Lintels of different houses.

title: (14460) Dos Torres - 1D Calle San Isidro
description: Dirt parking that can fit several motorhomes without problem, it is located on the town's soccer field, next to the municipal swimming pool that has a bar where they offer a little of everything. Impossible to access it the third week of August because the town festivals are celebrated. Quiet area the rest of the year. With shops 5 minutes away, without availability of water filling and emptying of gray water and toilets.

title: (14412) Pedroche -
description: Parking in hermitage. Quiet with benches and playground

title: (14480) Alcaracejos - 31 Calle Pozoblanco

title: (14480) Alcaracejos -

title: (14470) El Viso - 30 Poligono Industrial
description: Free point for loading / unloading water. We recommend visiting La Colada beach with unique sunsets. Nearby there is a playground and the municipal swimming pool.

title: (14470) El Viso - N-502
description: Picnic area with many tables and large trees. It has a hermitage and a stage. Very quiet but the road is heard though not very busy. A container bin has been installed just in front of the chapel. This is one of the cleanest sites I’ve visited during my travel through Spain.

title: (14470) El Viso -
description: A pretty corner with a barbecue, picnic table and a dumpster to throw away your garbage cans, very clean place, flowery, at the edge of the water with, in case, a large courtyard for the rain. easy to reach by motorhome despite the dirt road. possible to park several vehicles.

title: () El Viso - A-3281
description: Quiet spot next to the marsh to eat and take a quiet nap.

title: (14413) El Guijo - CO-7100
description: Parking in sanctuary / hermitage. Beautiful place in the middle of nature. Leveled and paved. Perfect for spending the night. Very calm

title: (14470) El Viso -
description: Free area at the foot of the lava reservoir, very quiet area

title: (14440) Villanueva de Córdoba - 20 Camino de la Plata
title_short: (14440) Villanueva de Córdoba - 20 Camino de la Plata

title: (14470) El Viso - Playa fluvial de la Colada
title_short: (14470) El Viso - Playa fluvial de la Colada

title: (14440) Villanueva de Córdoba - Ronda de San José
title_short: (14440) Villanueva de Córdoba - Ronda de San José

title: (14410) Torrecampo - CP-315
description: Sanctuary with very large picnic tables with river and services. It is paved until your arrival.

title: (14270) Hinojosa del Duque - A-422
description: Recreation area "Virgen de Guía". Pines and oaks with children's park, football field, tables with benches, containers and water. Clean and quiet place to rest next to a small hermitage. Chemin de Saint-Jacques Silver Route in front.

title: () Espiel - CO-6410
description: Nice picnic area. Two entrances the upper is parking space for cars. The lower has entrance for camper. Slightly slanted. Furthermore, tables with pergolas with reeds. Waste bins.

title: (14220) Espiel - CO-4400
description: Esplanade of land in which the buses that come to the Espiel lodge park (in the old train station). It has no services, but the place is perfect to spend a night and then be able to participate in the active leisure activities of the hostel, or simply take a walk on the trails in the area. Electricity available.

title: (14210) Villaharta -
description: Large parking with restaurant for car and truck. Quiet and clean.

title: (14220) Espiel -
description: Esplanade next to the hermitage. Sometimes you can find families eating, although it is not the most common. The parking lot is flat and accessible to any vehicle since the road is in excellent condition. We spent a very good night and the sky (without moon) is spectacular

title: (14270) Hinojosa del Duque - 2 Avenida Marqués de Santillana

title: (14448) Conquista - 11 Calle Barrio Estacion

title: (14220) Espiel - Unnamed Road
description: At the edge of the dam. More or less space depending on the water level.

title: (14230) Villanueva del Rey -

La lloc is quiet, peaceful, perfect for a stopover, a dream that only gets better in the end. Hello, there is a company on the coast but not Escoltem Cap Soroll. Approximately 1 km from Villanueva del Rey, 60 km from the motorhome area of Córdoba. If you use it, please respect the environment...

title: (14230) Villanueva del Rey -

title: (13413) Alamillo - CM-4202

title: (14240) Córdoba - 1B Prolongacion Pedroche

title: (14300) -

title: (14280) Belalcázar - 37 Calle Daoiz y Velarde
description: Asphalted, horizontal, next to the Roman bridge and fairground, downtown. Things to see: Sotomayor y Zúñiga Castle, beautiful 4-spout and hexagonal fountain with a water trough next to a public laundry room and viewpoint, Old Post, Plaza Ayto., El Pilar, Church, Convent, Hermitages.

title: (14200) Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo - 4B Camino Estación
description: Near the center and the beginning of a greenway, there is also an abandoned mining center that can be visited with caution as it is in very bad condition.

title: (14280) Belalcázar - A-422
description: Rest area on the road, with the possibility of spending the night to rest, it is next to the road.

title: (14300) Villaviciosa de Córdoba - 71 Carretera Posadas
description: Recreational area on the outskirts of town, there are no indications against the motorhome, we have only visited it in passing, if someone stays overnight to say so in the comments, it is a good place in the middle of nature for a stop on the way or spend a weekend in nature.

title: (14300) Villaviciosa de Córdoba - Unnamed Road
description: Picknick place with lots of shade, tables and bins. We cleaned the garbage. We stayed overnight and were not bothered. Some people came in the night to play loud music (Saturday). Be sure to park in the front lot if you stay the night, they closed the red/white barrier and this was not reopened when we left on Sunday afternoon. Beautiful night sky!

title: (14200) Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo - 13 Calle de la Paz
description: Quiet place to park and sleep without problems. There was movement of trucks and buses, but it is a flat parking lot and without too much noise.

title: (13490) Guadalmez -
description: Wonderful place to rest with your van or motorhome, next to the Guadalmez River and municipal swimming pool (open in summer) to take a shower, bath or even have a drink.

title: (14200) Peñarroya-Pueblonuevo - Unnamed Road
description: This picnic area is right in front of the paying one. You can maybe spend the night but I would not do it because a lot of barbecues fixed and not very clean, it attracts rats especially at night and therefore they eat you cables or other on your vehicle, seen the same thing in Portugal but here I did not see a hole because maybe the locals poison them. Otherwise there is a trash and nearby homes, fishermen also come, a semblance of beach in the small bay facing the other area. Above all do not take the dirt road on the right before you arrive because clogged despite the Google Map guidance, continue on the asphalt road to the gate and there was a sign but you can not read anything.

name: Casa rural Nuevo Pantano
title: (14200) Casa rural Nuevo Pantano
description: It is a private parking where there are rural houses, a quiet place in the middle of nature and next to the Sierra Boyera reservoir. Water, electricity and wifi installations.

title: (13490) Guadalmez - Unnamed Road
description: Area in nature near Guadalmez, we arrived by van, somewhat complicated for motorhomes, but the place is quiet and beautiful, close to the town to eat and shop.

title: (14300) Córdoba -
description: Perfect place in the middle of nature to spend a night and rest. Good access with a neighborhood road with very little traffic.

title: (14320) Estación de Obejo -
description: Nice parking lot right by a lake where you can swim and dogs are allowed. There are no prohibition signs. We stayed here for two nights and felt very comfortable. The only drawback: the military base next door practices shooting during the day, you have to be able to endure that.

title: (14209) Doña Rama - 38 Calle Sevilla
description: Picnic zone

title: (13412) Chillón -

title: (13400) Almadén - S/N Cerco San Teodoro

title: (14029) Córdoba - Unnamed Road
description: Parque Periubano LOS VILLARES Picnic area above Córdoba near N432. Toilets, hot water, playgrounds and restaurant. Very large with many parking, picnic and barbecue areas. Also for people with reduced mobility

title: (14029) Córdoba - 4 N-432a
description: On a slight hill between pine trees, annoying barking dogs further down near turn off the 432a, but continue up dirt tracks up hill a few hundred meters and it's quieter, next morning Guardia civil passed on their way up dirt track to look out point but didn't have a problem with us parking there :-)

title: (14350) Cerro Muriano -
description: Under a hermitage, pure nature, many trees that provide shade, for 1 or 2 nights, do not start a forest fire! Very dry here. In the town of Cerro Muriano they still bought food in the "native" market. I stayed here from Cáceres to Córdoba. The photo with a view is at the top of Eremita - doable with a maximum of 6 m mobile homes/vans and it is possible to turn around - to the location here 200 m below up to 7.50 m mobile home. No 4x4 needed. Some motorcyclists go through until 8 p.m. m., just move back.

title: (13400) Almadén - Calle Almería
description: Almadén motorhome area. 40 M2 of land per square, you can take out tables, chairs and open the side awning. located in a very quiet area of the town without noise or nuisance at night. New installation with all services: black and gray water emptying, electricity points (for a fee), bathrooms with showers and water filling. Located 3 minutes walk from the city center.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CO-3408
description: Parking lot in a great location for hiking. There are wells with water although there is no drain water. There are plenty of picnic and BBQ tables with garbage disposal. There is also a restaurant-bar nearby with a children's playground.

title: (13412) Chillón - 10 Calle García Lorca
description: Park with access to bathrooms and the possibility of leaving the motorhome

name: Camping Los Villares Sierra de Córdoba
title: (14029) Camping Los Villares Sierra de Córdoba
title_short: (14029) Camping Los Villares Sierra de Córdoba
description: Beautiful campig in a pine forest. Large plots, new and well maintained services. The campsite staff is very nice. It has a bar and a small swimming pool. In 15 minutes you are in the center of Córdoba.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CO-3408
description: Recreation area of ​​the peri-urban park of Los Villares. 10 km from Cordoba. Square with spacious and flat parking spaces. And with an interpretation center at 50 m. very interesting. No services, but recreational area and picnic nearby. And a small playground. A discovery. Forbidden at night

title: (13412) Chillón - 7 Calle Independencia
description: Street without traffic, perfect to spend the night, without services, near the center of the town, better bypass the town, through the center it can be complicated.

title: (14430) Adamuz - Vereda del Carpio
description: It is a crossroads of paths, paths and highways without much traffic where you can park and take an excursion through the Sierras de Adamuz and Villafranca. Path GR-48

title: (14011) Santa María de Trassierra -
description: Nice place for adventurous people, possibility of pecnotating, hiking. "nature and adventure 100%"

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: Nice spot around the dam. Easy access by a dirt road frequented by fishermen. At the end of April, the water is at 21 °. We had a bath. We preferred to leave access to the water's edge to fishermen. Several places are possible for a van. Nice site to leave cleaner after your departure.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: At the lake, be careful narrow path only for van and small motorhomes

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: Open where to leave the vehicle, day and night, not guarded and without services but in a good area. Possibility of bathing in the swamp and fishing.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: Place to park quietly, just below the bridge or the surrounding area.

title: () Córdoba -
description: This is near to the other “place in nature” marked on the map already, but if you have 4x4 continue on from the Church parking down into bottom of small valley and follow GPS for a few minutes up tricky track which requires 4x4 and good ground clearance. Spot is on ridge on edge of valley, great views, just pulled off track, very peaceful. One walker around 9am. View back to Church and across surrounding hills. Only 20 mins to central Cordoba- we used for two nights, no one there.

title: (14029) Córdoba - 56 Carretera Santo Domingo
description: Circular flat area under the church outside the overhanging village. Beautiful view of the hills and forests. Access any size, flat, 4-5 places. Quiet all night (it was Saturday night!)

title: (14029) Córdoba - 57 Carretera Santo Domingo
description: Close to several hermits including a big one with also a parking in front but if you wanted to be quiet remove you on the point in front of the small indicated on the map. Beside you have fixed tables. No other services because the water point does not work anymore. A house next door but quiet. The other hermits, including the one opposite, are to be visited with a walk except the one just before arriving and practically opposite a viewpoint overlooking Cordoba.

title: (14430) Adamuz - 7 Calle de los Granadillos
description: Large car park behind a school, close to all amenities. There is cafe, gas station, commerce and right next to the city center. We arrived on a Saturday night getting lost in the area. Very calm.

title: (14029) Córdoba - 28 CO-3405
description: Parking in grass possibility to get close to trees to be in the shade. Ideal to spend the day at the swimming pool located at 20 m. You will have a view on your campsite because the day without fears and you can sleep on the spot without worries

title: (14430) Adamuz - 8 A-421
description: Picnic area a bit abandoned but usable.

title: (14011) Santa María de Trassierra - 10P Calle Veneros de Bejarano
title_short: (14011) Santa María de Trassierra - 10P Calle Veneros de Bejarano
description: Public parking, easily accessible and from which you can go for a walk to visit the Popea Baths. Nearby there is a supermarket, pharmacy and a restaurant.

title: (14029) Córdoba - CH-1
description: Dam of Navallana, Alcolea (Córdoba).

title: (14420) Villafranca de Córdoba -
description: On the edge of a very rarely used gravel road. Beautiful 360° view. The driveway is a bit steep but doable. The small street that turns off is a dead end, further back there are more places.

title: (14012) Córdoba - Carretera de las Ermitas
description: Visitors parking. beautiful views. the only drawback is the accumulated garbage in the gutters

title: (14960) Córdoba - 30-34 Avenida de San José de Calasanz
title_short: (14960) Córdoba - 30-34 Avenida de San José de Calasanz
description: Plain of land in urbanization on the outskirts of Cordoba, quiet place to sleep and walk around.

address.street: 30-34 Avenida de San José de Calasanz

title: (06612) Capilla - Unnamed Road
description: When you go past La Chapelle san Sebastian take the right road perpendicular to the road closure barrier. The path is marked by palm trees and parking awaits you at the end. On site there are picnic tables, toilets, an artificial beach overlooking the lake with two outdoor showers. The view is incredible, calm reigns but watch out for the wind at night

title: (14960) Córdoba - 30 Calle Hinojosa del Duque
description: Several paths on a wooded hill at the bottom of a housing estate. View of the lights of Cordoba. We had a little barbecue and spent the night in peace.

title: (14960) Córdoba - Carretera de las Ermitas
description: A road that ends and begins a path in the mountains towards a hiking trail, from here you have beautiful views of all of Córdoba, slope incline.

title: (14610) Alcolea - 142 Carretera de Madrid
description: Pump for drinking water with good pressure Greengrocer just opposite. Park in front of it up to 7m or in the parking lot nearby.

title: (14012) Córdoba - 12 Calle Acebuche
description: Very quiet place to rest next to a social club that closes at 1 in the morning and you can rest alone. nearby there is a Mercadona.

title: (14011) Trassierra - Unnamed Road
description: Lonely turnaround at the end of a high road overlooking Córdoba.  Room for several vehicles.  Badly paved road.  Nearest residence is far away.  It seems like the only usage is parking for a trailhead to a seldom-used trail.

title: (14960) Córdoba - 71 Calle Dean Francisco Xavier
description: Public parking of | Great expanse and sand. Very quiet area with bus stop very close to reach the center. Weekends somewhat busier but affordable also [e.

title: (06612) Capilla - EX-323
description: Beautiful place in the chapel of San Sebastián (Chapel) with picnic tables, barbecues, green areas, swings, ... Near the river beach in the reservoir of La Serena. With showers and toilets. It has a restaurant (Don'D Chelo bar), where you can eat typical food of the area. Very quiet to rest, with shade and good access to AC.

title: (14610) Córdoba - 394B Carretera Madrid Nacional IV
description: Repsol station, with a very nice gentleman, the water is at the level of the petrol pump, however you have to put petrol to enjoy it!

name: KalmaChicha Natural Street Food
title: (14011) KalmaChicha Natural Street Food
description: Parking spot pure hikes and mountain bike tours in the heart of Sierra Morena. The owner is also the owner of the service station opposite, Mr. Juan is very friendly and offers a gas station, a small supermarket, butane and propane gas, drinking water and the best, a space totally integrated in the environment of nature to take a good coffee with beautiful muffins prepared in a traditional way by and with the recipe of the grandmother.

title: (14006) Córdoba - 2 Calle Decano Bartolome Vargas Escobar
title_short: (14006) Córdoba - 2 Calle Decano Bartolome Vargas Escobar
description: Quiet area for overnight.

title: (14006) Córdoba - 810 Calle Ingeniero Ruiz de Azúa
title_short: (14006) Córdoba - 810 Calle Ingeniero Ruiz de Azúa
description: Free parking ground zone. Next to a large park. quiet to spend the night. Drinking water fountain in the park.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 3E Calle Poeta Emilio Prados
description: Rammed earth car park. We only stayed during the day because around a lot of hlm. 2 km from the center.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 1P Calle Dolores Ibárruri
description: Parking area in a park with games for children, benches, in the district which is an urbanization of calm apartments, with bars, workshops, benches. Bus stop nearby and 20 minutes from the center, or 30 minutes on foot, a street behind a Mercadona

title: (14014) Córdoba - Calle Guarani
description: Without facilities It is fine to park and visit the city or spend a night or two at most. It is about 20 minutes from the center although there is also public transport

title: (14006) Córdoba - 1 Calle Pintor Monserrat
description: Laundry service with dryer, that works just fine. The machines accept coins but there is a cash-coin exchanger.

title: (14005) Córdoba - 23A Calle Francisco Gracia Trenas
description: A quiet, secure and calm place to stay the night, close to El Corte Inglés shopping. Residential area where it’s possible to jogging or ride a bike, also green parks nearby.

title: (14006) Córdoba - 315A Pasaje Pintor Racionero Castro
description: Parking day and night. Bivouac allowed. Free.

title: (14014) Córdoba - 1D Calle Escritor Almeida Garret
description: Free free parking, no schedule. Ideal for the night. Descampado in the Fatima neighborhood, a good neighborhood where you can rest peacefully, next to a school and a soccer field, and with a stream behind (just outside the city, the first area as soon as you enter from the highway of Madrid) . Very good communication with the historic center (at the corner stop buses line 1 and 2, which leave you in 15-20 minutes in the center).

title: (14014) Córdoba - 31 Calle Hermano Juan Fernández
description: Large capacity self-service laundry, cheap prices and good service

title: (14011) Córdoba - 18P Calle Juan de Gortz
description: Quiet street to park the motorhome

title: (14007) Córdoba -
description: Dead end street between the park and the gym. The gym offers 3 free days: you have a bathroom, changing room you can train or go to the pool if you like. During the hours of the shops there is a gorilla with yellow overalls, as in all the streets of Córdoba.

title: (14014) Córdoba - 5 Calle del Periodista Pedro Alvarez
title_short: (14014) Córdoba - 5 Calle del Periodista Pedro Alvarez
description: Renovated parking area, with plenty of parking, good place to sleep. It is very close to a Carrefour, gas stations, a Dia supermarket that has laundry, etc.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 4 Calle Isla Madeira
description: Speed Queen laundromat. No dogs allowed, but there are two hooks in front of the door where you can park your four-legged friend.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 131 Calle Arqueólogo García y Bellido
title_short: (14011) Córdoba - 131 Calle Arqueólogo García y Bellido
description: Land parking very close to the center. Stick with the bus station and train station, both of which have toilets.

title: (14014) Córdoba - 400 Ctra, Madrid, Kilómetro
description: Large lot without services. There is a gas station right on the site and opposite there is a well-known department store. Floor slightly level.

title: (14011) Córdoba - 1 Calle Islas Chafarinas
description: Land parking, flat and with the noise of the highway.

title: (14005) Córdoba - CO-3314
description: The Medina azahara car park, from where the buses leave to go to the site. Ample parking. Essential visit and watch the video in the visitor center.
